idea-plugin.name: Base16 Heetch Light

idea-plugin.description:
Base 16 Heetch Light for Jetbrains IDE


---------------


Colors by Geoffrey Teale (tealeg@gmail.com). Theme made using base16(https://github.com/chriskempson/base16). Theme generated by Shirom Makkad (https://github.com/ShiromMakkad/base16-jetbrains-ide)
